basics.name: Dominik Hurnaus
basics.label: Software Engineer/Software Architect/Team Lead
basics.summary: I am a seasoned software engineer (since 2002) with a deep knowledge of the full web stack, mobile development and software architecture. I worked in several projects as developer, software architect and leading project manager. I have an enterpreneuereal mindset with a passion for pragmatic and high-quality software solutions.

work.summary: Queuing detection and optimization systems for ski areas, airports, and stores.
highlights: Featured in austrias investors show '2 Minuten - 2 Millionen'
EIC ICT Labs Idea Competition Finals
Special price at trend@venture 2014
3rd Place Edison Award 2014

work.position: Software Engineer, Software Architect, Team Lead
highlights: DSL for describing financial products.
Software architecture in a Java-based enterprise software project in the automotive industry.
Testautomation based on Borland Silk4J for a customer in the transportation industry.
Project lead, architect in many medium-sized project teams in different industries (medical, telecommunications, logistics, etc.)
In-house course instructor, team coach, responsible employee, etc.

work.summary: Design, implementation and operation of 'eRecruiter', a web-based recruiting and applicant management software.
highlights: BlackJack Trainer App for Android, BlackBerry, KindleFire - http://www.hornetapps.com/blackjacktrainer.html
Nova Rechner App for Android - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=at.hornetapps.novacalculator
Order management, production planning and logistics software system for a international bakery(2006-2009).
Windows Phone 8.1 app for bluetooth-enabled activity tracking device - http://www.windowsphone.com/de-at/store/app/tractive-motion/a748b092-4dc9-43e1-8a3a-5847ebebd9c2
Tech2b technical/scientific advisor for Austrian Startups

work.company: Christian Doppler Laboratory for Automated Software Engineering
work.summary: Dissertation: Semantic Assistance for Industrial Automation Based on Contracts and Verification
highlights: Patent DE 10 2009 051 808.8 https://register.dpma.de/DPMAregister/pat/register?AKZ=1020090518088&CURSOR=4

work.summary: Voluntary Internship: Analysis of automotive on-board-network traffic.
Internship: Programming of a tool to measure network metrics, web performance tests.

courses: Software as a Service: SaaS Architectures, Ruby, Rails, BDD, TDD
Introduction to Artificial Intelligence - Advanced Track

volunteer.summary: Organizer, co-founder, and speaker of the regular technology-related meetup 'Technologieplauscherl' in Linz, Austria.
highlights: Founded the regular meetup in 2012, having monthly meetings with approximately 50 participants per event.
Participation in a few widely-used OSS libraries, ie. Trello.NET or mite.NET.

volunteer.summary: Active contributer to the open streetmap project in Upper Austria.

highlights: Team member of the Austrian team coreCoder at the international Challenge 24 coding contest in Budapest, Hungary.
Participant in many of the Catalysts coding contests.
Team coach of the Austrian team at the IBM ICPC coding contest finals in Tokyo, Japan (March 2007).

skills.name: 12+ years experience using Java and building enterprise software systems
10+ years experience in web development
keywords: Common JavaScript frameworks, ie. jQuery, Bootstrap, AngularJS, ...

skills.name: 4+ years experience developing for mobile platforms

references.name: David Hansen, Group Engineering Manager, Microsoft
references.reference: Dominik was both technically strong and energetic. He came up with great solutions to problems we had to solve on the team.
